articles.author: Giles Richards
articles.title: Miami F1 GP drama: Leclerc crash hands Pérez pole as Verstappen suffers - The Guardian
articles.description: Max Verstappen will have to start Sunday’s race in ninth after a red flag ended qualifying, while it was a grim day for 13th-placed Lewis Hamilton
articles.content: Max Verstappen faces the toughest test of his season after being punished for a mistake in qualifying for the Miami Grand Prix. The race desperately wants some fireworks to go with the grand spectacl… [+10482 chars]

articles.author: Lukas Knöfler
articles.title: Controversies over crosswinds and nature break rob Demi Vollering of Vuelta Femenina red jersey - Cyclingnews
articles.description: 'I am hungry for revenge' says tearful Team SD Worx rider with one day remaining to race
articles.content: Saturday's stage of La Vuelta Femenina raised controversy as overall leader Demi Vollering (Team SD Worx) lost her red classification jersey to Annemiek van Vleuten (Movistar Team). It began only 36k… [+4759 chars]
